name: splintered-stormshards
effect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
short_effect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.

flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.
